name: Don't Stop Dicing
description:
Don't Stop Dicing is a fast paced cooking Platformer that lets you be a master at making sandwiches.  You need to complete orders before time runs out and serve them to the picky customers. One wrong ingredient and you will end up with a pile of disgusting goo!! So get the buns and pieces  from your kitchen and dice them up!

>>>>Controls<<<<<

arrow keys to move 

"Z" to interact with objects

"X" to drop item

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>

This game was made for the 83rd Mini Jam in three days.

--Credits--

Programmer: Goldax

Visuals and sound design: Shoie

* This is the BETA build so sound effects and better looking background coming soon in update.
